column3: is a [[Tolkien Societies|Tolkien Society]] based in [[wikipedia:Spain|Spain]]. It was founded in [[1991]] in [[Wikipedia:Elche|Elche]].<ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=http://www.sociedadtolkien.org/texto.php?id=11|articlename=The Sociedad Tolkien Española|dated=|website=[http://www.sociedadtolkien.org/ Sociedadtolkien.org]|accessed=2 February 2013}}</ref> Its first chairman was [[José Manuel Ferrández Bru]].<ref>{{webcite|author=[[José Manuel Ferrández Bru]]|articleurl=http://www.josemanuelferrandez.com/ENindex.html|articlename=A brief biography|dated=|website=[http://www.josemanuelferrandez.com/ENindex.html JoseManuelFerrandez.com]|accessed=2 February 2013}}</ref>

column1: ''Estel'' is the official journal of Sociedad Tolkien Española.
